title: Pleasanton Beautiful 2 bdrm 1.5 bath townhouse with awesome views
posting_body: A beautiful town house (end unit with lawn) has 2bedroom and 1.5 bathrooms, 1 sunroom, 1.5 bathrooms, plus a large private wooden deck with awesome view.
Kitchen, living room with fireplace and half bathroom is on the 1st floor.
On the 2nd floor, there are two bedrooms with a full bathroom
An extra sunroom is easy to convert to other purpose of using, such as office or playroom.
Detached full-size one car garage as well as an extra carport is extra bonus.
Walk distance to Vintage Hills Elementary School (10 score)
Community Park across street and close to shopping area
Minutes away from the historic downtown of Pleasanton and nearby highway 580 and 680, BART station, ACE train station.
Include water and garbage fee
HVAC system (Heating Ventilation Air Conditioning)
In-house laundry with stacked washer and dryer
Include Stainless steel Refrigerator, Dish washer . . .
Microwave oven and Electric Stove
Lease Terms:
• 1 year lease agreement
• $2,940/monthly rent
• $3,000 security deposit
Available in late July.
No pet Please.
If you are interested , please reply this post with your info and phone number.
Thank you.
